entry.title: Started Blogging
entry.summary: Hi everyone! As my new year’s resolution, I created this blog using github to delve into my areas of interest, digital speech processing and computer networks. Once a month, I’ll discuss a paper regarding these areas. Occasionally, I’ll post about my side projects as well - Advent of Code I did last year, how I made this blog using github, etc. I am excited about this blog and hope you are, t...
